content: I don't have access to current practices of pedigree. however, in general, the nutritional values of pet food products are determined by a combination of laboratory analysis and feeding trials. laboratory analysis involves the chemical analysis of the ingredients in the pet food to determine their nutrient composition, while feeding trials involve feeding the pet food to animals and monitoring their health and well-being to determine if the food meets their nutritional needs. pet food companies may also consult with veterinary nutritionists and follow guidelines set by organizations such as aafco (the association of american feed control officials) to ensure the nutritional adequacy of their products.
